abstract: Riskalyze aims to help you evaluate your risk tolerance for investments.
snippet: Riskalyze aims to help you evaluate your risk tolerance for investments.
lead_paragraph: Would you rather be guaranteed that you'll lose $489 on a $1,000 investment? Or, would you prefer a 50-50 chance of either losing all of it, or gaining $1,500?

headline.main: New Site Seeks to Analyze Investors' Appetite for Risk
